snippet.title: Gangs of Sherwood | Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
Prepare to steal from the rich to give to the poor!

Discover the first gameplay footage of #GangsofSherwood. Coming this Fall on Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC.

Fight the armies of the Sheriff of Nottingham and lead the rebellion, solo or in co-op with up to 4 players. Play as one of the Merry Men, combine your attacks, and free the people in this futuristic dystopia inspired by the legend of Robin Hood.

Join the Merry Men on Twitter

https://twitter.com/GangsofSherwood
